Headline: #7 Harrison Temporary Eastbound Reroute near Harrison/St. Louis
ShortDescription: EB 7 Harrison buses are temporarily rerouted via Harrison, Central Park, Jackson, Homan and Harrison due to street blockage near Harrison/St. Louis.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Eastbound #7 Harrison buses are temporarily rerouted via Harrison, Central Park, Jackson, Homan and Harrison due to street blockage near Harrison/St. Louis.

Westbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.
